descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Verdana][color=#ff00ff][size=6][b]Layia[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#d5a6bd](Dark Beauty, Born At Night)[/color]
[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3mkbnl98n/20160731001250_1.jpg[/img]

[font=Verdana]Name:  Layia
Race:  Redguard
Location:  Falkreath (Dead Man's Drink)
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  .94
Weight: 86
Body:  UUNP Custom (UUNP HDT Category)
UUNP Non HDT Now Available
Skin:  Demonic

Armor:  Steel Nord Plate Bikini Armor v2 (UUNP HDT Version)
Armor:  Ancient Draugr Armor (UUNP Non-HDT Version)

Weapon:  Ebony with CL Weapon Replacer (UUNP HDT Version)
Weapon:  Ancient Draugr Axe (UUNP Non-HDT Version)


ENB:  RealVision
Tested with AFT & EFF

Skill bonuses to Archery, One-Handed, Sneak.  Only spell is Healing.  Redguard traits/bonuses.

Now Available in the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78248/?]Redguard Follower Pack[/url][/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/t6mlu0umf/20160731000402_1.jpg[/img]

[font=Verdana][color=#ff00ff][size=4]REQUIREMENTS:
[/size][/color]
[b][u]UUNP HDT Version
[/u][/b]
HDT Compatible Skeleton (I used [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url])
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url] (for UUNP HDT build & armor)

[b][u]UUNP Non-HDT Version[/u][/b]

TBBP Compatible Skeleton such as XPMSE (Armor Requirement)

[color=#ff00ff][size=4]RECOMMENDED:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]FaceLight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]

[color=#ff00ff][size=4]INSTALLATION:[/size][/color]

Manual or your favorite Mod Manager

[color=#ff00ff][size=4]UNINSTALL:[/size][/color]

Manual removal of all Layia files or your favorite Mod Manager removal process.

[/font]REPORTED ISSUES:

[font=Verdana]Rebuilt the HDT body in the newest version of Bodyslide after a report of the HDT not working properly.  Version 1.1 has the rebuilt body.



[color=#ff00ff][size=4]MANY THANKS TO:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76828/?]Make A Follower Kit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile (character creation/screen archer)[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]

[color=#ff00ff][size=4]CREDITS/RESOURCES/PERMISSIONS:
[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?]Demonic Skin[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72825/?]Maevan2's Eye Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdo's[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76089/?]YevMod's Makeup Pack[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54118/?]The Neith Team Warpaints Set[/url]

Bethesda (of course)

[color=#d5a6bd]*If I forgot anyone please kindly remind me*[/color]
[/font]
